Partly cloudy skies PERIOD Low around 75F PERIOD Winds ENE at  to  mph PERIOD

Updated November     pm





A student left his bag on a table at Sinclair Library and went
to the restroom PERIOD When he returned his wallet was gone PERIOD

A tourist on a rented moped crashed while making a right turn
onto EastWest Road from Dole Street PERIOD She said that a UH Mnoa
vehicle almost ran into her as it made a left from Dole which
caused her to scream and crash into the median PERIOD The driver helped
her out of the road and continued on his merry way PERIOD The moped and
its driver were both injured PERIOD

A student walked past Saunders Hall at  p.m PERIOD and noticed a
man standing on the sidewalk PERIOD As she approached she noticed that
his shorts were unzipped and his  were hanging out PERIOD
He stood there and looked at her as she hurriedly walked past PERIOD As
she told a Freeman Guard about the man with the malfunctioning
zipper a car stopped and picked the man up PERIOD

Campus Security noticed two students sitting on the ground
checking their injuries near a moped PERIOD The students told officers
that they crashed when they tried to drive around a speed bump on
Lower Campus Road PERIOD They also admitted to drinking earlier PERIOD Both
were treated at the scene for scrapes and bruises PERIOD Drinking and
driving a moped  FAIL PERIOD Drinking and driving with a passenger on a
moped  MAJOR FAIL PERIOD

Campus Security found marijuana and a pipe in a planter near the
law school PERIOD Officers had earlier been questioning two students from
Johnson Hall who were suspected of smoking marijuana PERIOD Their names
and the evidence were forwarded to the judicial affairs office PERIOD

Thieves cut a hole in the fence of the batting cage on the lower
campus PERIOD They stole a leaf blower PERIOD A leaf blower could be used to
quickly dry hair clean your dorm room or power a
skateboard PERIOD
